Live Trivia Gameshow

Participate in live trivia games every Monday, Wednesday and Friday night at 8pm EST

Next Game Starts In

Hosted By James DerPino

Join James DerPino as he attempts to entertain you through your nightly trivia rounds

Play With Friends

Trivia games are played in groups of 4. But don't worry if you have no friends - we'll match you!

Learn How To Play

It's simple! You'll be show a series of multiple choice questions. Pick the correct answer and get all the points!

How to Play
When the host starts the game you will be shown 20 multiple choice questions one at a time. You'll only have a few seconds to guess and all answers are final. You'll compete in groups of 4 and whoever scores the highest in your group wins!
